markdownRemark.excerpt:
-q :- be very quite, we are acting only as a tunnel. 使用安静模式
-T :- Do not allocate a pseudo tty, we are only acting a tunnel.不要分配tty
-f :- move the ssh process…
markdownRemark.html:
ssh -qTfnN -D 7070 xxx@xxx.com

-q :- be very quite, we are acting only as a tunnel. 使用安静模式 -T :- Do not allocate a pseudo tty, we are only acting a tunnel.不要分配tty -f :- move the ssh process to background, as we don’t want to interact with this ssh session directly. 后台运行 -N :- Do not execute remote command.不执行远程命令 -n :- redirect standard input to /dev/null.从定向输出到/dev/null

frontmatter.title: Mac 下 MySQL 开启 bin log
近期接触的技术点总结
